name: Ext_R3_ConceptMap_gr_un_mode
title: Cross-version Extension for R3.ConceptMap.group.unmapped.mode for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents ConceptMap.group.unmapped.mode from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ConceptMap|3.0.2 for use in FHIR R5.

element.definition: Defines which action to take if there is no match in the group. One of 3 actions is possible: use the unmapped code (this is useful when doing a mapping between versions, and only a few codes have changed), use a fixed code (a default code), or alternatively, a reference to a different concept map can be provided (by canonical URL).
element.comment: `ConceptMap.group.unmapped.mode` maps to R5 `ConceptMap.group.unmapped.mode`. So is mapped as Equivalent.

element.definition: Defines which action to take if there is no match in the group. binding.description: Defines which action to take if there is no match in the group.
